outcome.title: Substitution method
outcome.description: Evaluate various integrals via the substitution method.

outcome.title: Integration by parts
outcome.description: Compute integrals using integration by parts.

outcome.title: Integration of Trignometry
outcome.description: Compute integrals involving products of trigonometric functions.

outcome.title: Trigonometric Substitution
outcome.description: Use trigonometric substitution to compute indefinite integrals.

outcome.title: Table of Integrals
outcome.description: Integrate functions using a table of integrals..

outcome.title: Partial fractions
outcome.description: Integrate using the method of partial fractions.

outcome.title: Integration strategy
outcome.description: Select appropriate strategies for integration.

outcome.title: Improper integrals
outcome.description: Identify and compute improper integrals.

outcome.title: Average Values
outcome.description: Compute the average value of a function on an interval.

outcome.title: Arc Length
outcome.description: Estimate the arclength of a curve with Riemann sums and find an integral which computes the arclength.

outcome.title: Volumes of Revolution
outcome.description: Compute volumes of solids of revolution.

outcome.title: Areas of Revolution
outcome.description: Compute surface areas of surfaces of revolution.

outcome.title: Density, Mass, Centers of Mass
outcome.description: Set up integrals to solve problems involving density, mass, and center of mass.

outcome.title: Physics Applications
outcome.description: Set up integrals to solve problems involving work, force, and/or pressure.

outcome.title: Parametric/vector equations
outcome.description: Sketch the graph of a two-dimensional parametric/vector equation, and convert such equations into equations of only x and y.

outcome.title: Parametric/vector derivatives
outcome.description: Compute derivatives and tangents related to two-dimensional parametric/vector equations.

outcome.title: Parametric/vector arclength
outcome.description: Compute arclengths related to two-dimensional parametric/vector equations.

outcome.title: Polar coordinates
outcome.description: Convert points and equations between polar and Cartesian coordinates and equations.

outcome.title: Polar arclength
outcome.description: Compute arclengths of curves given in polar coordinates.

outcome.title: Polar area
outcome.description: Compute areas bounded by curves given in polar coordinates.

outcome.title: Sequence formulas
outcome.description: Define and use explicit and recursive formulas for sequences.

outcome.title: Sequence properties and limits
outcome.description: Determine if a sequence is convergent, divergent, monotonic, or bounded, and compute limits of convergent sequences.

outcome.title: Partial sum sequence
outcome.description: Convert a (telescoping) sequence into its partial sum sequence, and find its limit.

outcome.title: Geometric summations
outcome.description: Determine convergence and values of geometric summations.

outcome.title: Basic convergence tests
outcome.description: Use Divergence, Alternating Summation, and Integral Tests to determine convergence of summations.

outcome.title: Comparison tests
outcome.description: Use Direct and Limit Comparison Tests to determine convergence of summations.

outcome.title: Ratio and Root tests
outcome.description: Use Ratio and Root Tests to determine convergence of summations.

outcome.title: Absolute convergence
outcome.description: Determine absolute and conditional convergence of summations.

outcome.title: Summation convergence strategy
outcome.description: Identify appropriate convergence tests for various summations.

outcome.title: Power series
outcome.description: Approximate functions defined as power series.

outcome.title: Domain of power series
outcome.description: Describe the domain of convergence for a given power series.

outcome.title: Manipulation of power series
outcome.description: Compute power series by manipulating known exponential/trigonometric/binomial power series.

outcome.title: Taylor series
outcome.description: Compute a Taylor or Maclaurin series for a function.
